body:
I'm going on vacation, so I need some packs that are decently well made and look nice. I'd love to see the packs out there. I'm interested in 32x + packs.

Anyone else can use this thread as well. Just say what resolution of pack you're interested in and the style of it ( pixelated, designed, bolded etc), and I'll find the pack that fits you.
 
I'd also love to see what packs the community uses, just post a link of the pack you use in your comment if your letting someone know a good pack to use. Also put a brief description of the pack to explain the feel and how it looks.

The thread was made to share uncommon yet pretty packs out there. I'm fine with people posting commonly used packs, but try to be original. I'll try my best to post on everyone's concern, question, recommendations and the LFPs
body_tagged:

I'd also love to see what packs the community uses, just post a link of the pack you use in your comment if your letting someone know a good pack to use. Also put a brief description of the pack to explain the feel and how it looks.

The thread was made to share uncommon yet pretty packs out there. I'm fine with people posting commonly used packs, but try to be original. I'll try my best to post on everyone's concern, question, recommendations and the LFPs

replies.body:
What do you mean no bow indicator?

~The Snow Queen
replies.body_tagged:
What do you mean no bow indicator?

~The Snow Queen

replies.body:
A bow indicater is where a small color section shows up to tell you the current charge of power. A common example would be this:

Green : 1st charge
Yellow : 2nd Charge
Red : Full Charge
replies.body_tagged:
A bow indicater is where a small color section shows up to tell you the current charge of power. A common example would be this:

Green : 1st charge
Yellow : 2nd Charge
Red : Full Charge

~The Snow Queen

~The Snow Queen

That is just my opinion though.

replies.body:
I might as well add this while I can

If you're going to recommend a resource pack, it'd be nice if you pull a brief description of the pack, maybe a sentence or two. An example would be:

I like the Badass Galaxy Pack! It has a nice themed galaxy feel with a very nice diamond sword, and vibrant colors are used!

I decided this because some people may want a sneak peak of the pack, so might as well eh?

I also fixed the spelling error in the title
replies.body_tagged:
I might as well add this while I can

I decided this because some people may want a sneak peak of the pack, so might as well eh?
